cookieCards.description: A true classic you can never go wrong with choosing. Each cookie is packed with a boatload of semi-sweet chocolate chips.
M&M – Each cookie is packed with an explosion of M&M candy pieces. Need we say more?
A peanut butter lover’s dream. Packed with Reese’s cups, Reese’s pieces, and semi-sweet chocolate chips. Each cookie is topped with melted peanut butter chips.
Packed with Oreo crumbles and white chocolate chips.
America’s favorite campfire treat in cookie form. Each cookie is packed with Hershey’s chocolate chips, semi-sweet chocolate chips, graham crackers and topped with a gooey marshmallow.
A party in your mouth and an all-time favorite for birthday celebrations. Each cookie is packed with white chocolate chips and rainbow sprinkles.

cookieCards.cardTitle: Cream Cheese Stuffed Red Velvet - TBD

cookieCards.description: Carrot cake in cookie form that literally melts in your mouth. Each cookie is topped with cream cheese frosting, freshly grated carrots, and walnuts.

Take a 5-minute break to enjoy this cookie. Inspired by the Take 5 candy bar, each cookie is packed with peanuts, pretzels, and chocolate chips. It’s topped with gooey caramel, melted chocolate and a pretzel.
